name: MAZE (itch) (WuffderHundeheld)
description:
Welcome to MAZE, a free and fun little marble maze game for the playdate!

I always found these wooden marble games fun and so I decided to try to make one for the playdate and here it is:

It's a marble maze game, which means your goal is to move the marble to the goal while avoiding the holes on the board. You control the marble by tilting the playdate. 

What the game offers:
  • 60 custom levels of varying (and inconsistent) difficulty 
  • You can choose the sensitivity of the marble in the pause menu
  • "Dark Mode" 
  • Automatic calibration for different holding positions of the playdate
  • Manual calibration for the accelerometer for if you have to switch holding positions
The future:

If I come around to it, here are some features and stuff I want to add to the game:

  • More levels
  • A build in level editor
  • Misc: 
    • More Sounds and Soundtrack
    • Different Modes (Time Challenge, Collectables, Avoid Walls)
Have fun, it's free!

If you have any remarks, problems or suggestions, feel free to write a comment. I'll make sure to respond and take in any feedback.
